message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  It's a good start, and we can work from there.

Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm proposing a 68/32 split in my favor.  Given the rapid devaluation, any further delays will only hurt you more than me. This offer ensures you get a decent share while acknowledging the time pressure.

Let's be reasonable.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split. The money is depreciating quickly, and this is the fairest way to ensure we both get something. If you reject this, we'll be fighting over shrinking pieces of the pie.
